title: Hand-drawn looking 2-color 3D shaded caps
content:
Anyone able to identify the font with the text - YOUR OPINION MATTERS?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [NSS\_2010\_A6\_Flyer\_English.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013124851/http:/typophile.com/files/NSS_2010_A6_Flyer_English.jpg) | 52.38 KB |
author: simonbucks

comments.content:
I started by looking for 3D fonts, but I think this is actually a layered font. The bottom layer has a diagonal line fill. You could probably create a similar effect with any cartoon font of your choice. I did look at Cartoon and Comic categories at Dafont, but I was looking for this effect and not for the letterforms.

- Mike Yanega
